data.eml:eml: A new trans-Andean Stick Catfish of the genus Farlowella Eigenmann & Eigenmann, 1889 (Siluriformes: Loricariidae) with the first record of the genus for the río Magdalena Basin in Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ballen, Gustavo A., Mojica, José Iván (2014): A new trans-Andean Stick Catfish of the genus Farlowella Eigenmann & Eigenmann, 1889 (Siluriformes: Loricariidae) with the first record of the genus for the río Magdalena Basin in Colombia. Zootaxa 3765 (2): 134-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3765.2.2
